articles.author: Vivian Ho, Scott Nover
articles.title: Kari Lake lays off more than 500 staff at Voice of America parent agency - The Washington Post
articles.description: Amid a contentious court battle, the Trump administration official sent long-awaited termination notices to staffers who have been waiting on administrative leave for months.
articles.content:
Kari Lake, the Trump administration official tasked with dismantling the Voice of America, sent termination notices to more than 500 employees at the broadcaster and its parent agency Friday night.
… [+290 chars]

articles.author: Nino Paoli
articles.title: 'A different shock to the system': De minimis tariff dodge ending means less purchasing power for Americans - Fortune
articles.description: Closing the loophole could raise $10 billion a year, but experts say the number is "not all that meaningful" compared to the country’s trade deficit.
articles.content: The de minimis exemptiona tariff loophole that for years made millions of direct-to-consumer imports duty freeis gone, and its end marks a structural shift for American shoppers and logistics provide… [+3814 chars]
